title: Traditional Fiora Skin (PLZ)
body: The Champion Update for Fiora is a very well designed kit. I have great feelings towards the mechanical side of the update but not appearance of her classic model. I wanted Fiora to use the same classic skin before she was given the new one. I wanted to see if Fiora can get a traditional skin like Sejuani and Trundle. So this way the veteran Fiora players can still use the old classic but still have the new one on the side. I personally have all of Fiora's skins and I really loved using the old classic more than the skins. If she can get a "**Traditional Fiora"** skin I would be very happy, especially since she hasn't gotten a skin in a long time. But I was also curious, who else would like to see this happen?

I read a little of Riot's shpeal about Gangplank. They seem to think that the whole captain Gangplank, or pirate lord theme is just too goofy to be taken seriously. (though I somewhat disagree after the voice over. since the newer quotes point to a more in depth philosophy.) Of coarse it would be completely alienating to the community to completely remove that theme from gangplank. So they created two gangplanks. One before, and after the events of Burning tides. 

I actually seen his new skin, and I don't even think it's that bad. (Still like captain better) He's not that fat, though I feel like the splash art doesn't best represent him. The part I don't really like though is the hat. It looks ridiculous, and doesn't fit the pirate theme too well.

You misunderstand, they meant old gangplank was too goofy. As in, his lore was all about him being a pirate lord who killed his own father and whatnot, but in game he sounds like really jolly and goofy, not the guy you'd expect from the lore. The new VO fixed that.

I asked for a traditional Sion for a while, and the response wasn't that it defeated the purpose of the VU, rather they claimed that they learned from Trundle and Karma (not Sejuani, they always double down on that one) and decided that if they could keep the core of the character the traditional skins weren't value added due to the small group they would affect and the effort needed. 

Of course Sion's core character was apparently big dead guy with axe and Fiora's is Lady gaga with sword. 

Gangplank changed the core Identity and theme, that they recognized, from goofy to violently serious, so I think that's why they went with Captain Gangplank.

I actually find this quite interesting. so far, I have left precisely 0 comments on anything. but this, I feel I must say something about. A lot of champions have gotten VU's (in the form of skins that cost RP) that fit their champions identity really well (SG udyr, captain fortune, final boss veigar, even captain GP, and im sure there is many others). I would be willing to bet that the reason this VU isn't completely up to scratch is because from the get go riot knew they wouldn't be making any actual money off this update. they probably just threw it together and said to their designers "hey, don't worry too much about this one it isn't worth anything anyways". that being said, thank you for fixing the hair. But, if your VU is going to be worse than what it was, please just leave it alone.

In short, bring back the old fiora skin. But, now I cant stress this enough, KEEP this new kit. I love the kit.

Easiest way to do that would be to make the riposte automatically target the first source of dmg. It doesn't make sense that the riposte would be an attack if no one hit you.
